message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?

I understand that $1000000 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1250000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1250000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me. I can offer it to you for $1100000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle at last.
I appreciate your concession, but $1100000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
